verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w descended|strong="G2597"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add with\add* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w orator|strong="G4489"\w* \add named\add* \w Tertullus|strong="G5061"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w informed|strong="G1718"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was called \w forth|strong="G2564"\w*, \w Tertullus|strong="G5061"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \add him\add*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Seeing that \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w* we \w enjoy|strong="G5177"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w quietness|strong="G1515"\w*, and \w that|strong="G2532"\w* very worthy \w deeds|strong="G2735"\w* are \w done|strong="G1096"\w* unto \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w thy|strong="G4674"\w* \w providence|strong="G4307"\w*,

We \w accept|strong="G0588"\w* \add it\add* \w always|strong="G3839"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in all \w places|strong="G3837"\w*, most \w noble|strong="G2903"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w thankfulness|strong="G2169"\w*.

\w Notwithstanding|strong="G1161"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I \w be|strong="G1465"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w further|strong="G4119"\w* \w tedious|strong="G1465"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, I \w pray|strong="G3870"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* that thou wouldest \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4674"\w* \w clemency|strong="G1932"\w* a few \w words|strong="G4935"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we have \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \add a\add* \w pestilent|strong="G3061"\w* \add fellow\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w mover|strong="G2795"\w* of \w sedition|strong="G4714"\w* \w among|strong="G3956"\w* all the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w throughout|strong="G2596"\w* the \w world|strong="G3625"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* a \w ringleader|strong="G4414"\w* of the \w sect|strong="G0139"\w* of the \w Nazarenes|strong="G3480"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* hath gone \w about|strong="G3985"\w* to \w profane|strong="G0953"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*: \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w took|strong="G2902"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* would \w have|strong="G2309"\w* \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w our|strong="G2251"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* \w Lysias|strong="G3079"\w* \w came|strong="G3928"\w* \add upon us\add*, and \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w violence|strong="G0970"\w* \w took|strong="G0520"\w* \add him\add* \w away|strong="G0520"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w*,

\w Commanding|strong="G2753"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w accusers|strong="G2725"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*: by \w examining|strong="G0350"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w thyself|strong="G0846"\w* \w mayest|strong="G1410"\w* take \w knowledge|strong="G1921"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* these \w things|strong="G5130"\w*, \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w assented|strong="G4934"\w*, saying \w that|strong="G5335"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w were|strong="G2192"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, after \w that|strong="G1161"\w* the \w governor|strong="G2232"\w* had \w beckoned|strong="G3506"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w speak|strong="G3004"\w*, \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w Forasmuch|strong="G4012"\w* as I know \w that|strong="G1987"\w* \w thou|strong="G4571"\w* hast \w been|strong="G5607"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* a \w judge|strong="G2923"\w* unto \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, I do the more \w cheerfully|strong="G2115"\w* answer \w for|strong="G0626"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*:

Because \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w thou|strong="G4675"\w* \w mayest|strong="G1410"\w* \w understand|strong="G1097"\w*, that there \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w yet|strong="G4119"\w* \w but|strong="G2228"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1177"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w since|strong="G0575"\w* I went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* for to \w worship|strong="G4352"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2147"\w* \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* \w disputing|strong="G1256"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w*, \w neither|strong="G2228"\w* raising \w up|strong="G1999"\w* the \w people|strong="G3793"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w synagogues|strong="G4864"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="G3777"\w* can \w they|strong="G1410"\w* prove the \w things|strong="G3936"\w* \w whereof|strong="G4012"\w* \w they|strong="G3568"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w accuse|strong="G2723"\w* \w me|strong="G3450"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* I \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* unto \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* they \w call|strong="G3004"\w* \w heresy|strong="G0139"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* worship \w I|strong="G3000"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of my \w fathers|strong="G3971"\w*, \w believing|strong="G4100"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* are \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*:

And \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w themselves|strong="G3778"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w allow|strong="G4327"\w*, that there \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w* a \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w both|strong="G5037"\w* of the \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w herein|strong="G5129"\w* do I \w exercise|strong="G0778"\w* \w myself|strong="G0846"\w*, to \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w always|strong="G1275"\w* a \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w* void of \w offence|strong="G0677"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add toward\add* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4119"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* I \w came|strong="G3854"\w* to \w bring|strong="G4160"\w* \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w offerings|strong="G4376"\w*.

\w Whereupon|strong="G3739"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w Jews|strong="G0773"\w* \w from|strong="G1161"\w* \w Asia|strong="G3588"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w purified|strong="G0048"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w tumult|strong="G2351"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to have been \w here|strong="G3918"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* \w thee|strong="G4675"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w object|strong="G2723"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w ought|strong="G5100"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

Or \w else|strong="G2228"\w* \w let|strong="G2036"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \add here\add* \w say|strong="G2036"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* they have \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* evil \w doing|strong="G0092"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, while \w I|strong="G3450"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*,

\w Except|strong="G2228"\w* it be \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* I \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Touching|strong="G4012"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* am called in \w question|strong="G2919"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w having|strong="G1492"\w* more \w perfect|strong="G0199"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1492"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \add that\add* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, he \w deferred|strong="G0306"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w When|strong="G3752"\w* \w Lysias|strong="G3079"\w* the chief \w captain|strong="G5506"\w* shall come \w down|strong="G2597"\w*, I will know the \w uttermost|strong="G1231"\w* of \w your|strong="G5209"\w* \w matter|strong="G2596"\w*.

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* he \w commanded|strong="G1299"\w* a \w centurion|strong="G1543"\w* to \w keep|strong="G5083"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* to \w let|strong="G2192"\w* \add him\add* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w liberty|strong="G0425"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that he should \w forbid|strong="G2967"\w* \w none|strong="G3367"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w acquaintance|strong="G2398"\w* to \w minister|strong="G5256"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* come \w unto|strong="G4334"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w when|strong="G3854"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w Drusilla|strong="G1409"\w*, \w which|strong="G5607"\w* was a \w Jewess|strong="G2453"\w*, he sent \w for|strong="G3343"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

And \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w reasoned|strong="G1256"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w temperance|strong="G1466"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w come|strong="G2071"\w*, \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w* \w trembled|strong="G1719"\w*, and \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, Go thy \w way|strong="G4198"\w* for this \w time|strong="G3568"\w*; \w when|strong="G1161"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a convenient \w season|strong="G2540"\w*, I will \w call|strong="G3333"\w* for \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*.

He \w hoped|strong="G1679"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w money|strong="G5536"\w* should have been \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w that|strong="G3704"\w* he might \w loose|strong="G3089"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* he sent \w for|strong="G3343"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w oftener|strong="G4437"\w*, and \w communed|strong="G3656"\w* \w with|strong="G0260"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G4137"\w* two \w years|strong="G1333"\w* \w Porcius|strong="G4201"\w* \w Festus|strong="G5347"\w* \w came|strong="G2983"\w* \w into|strong="G1240"\w* \w Felixâ€™ room|strong="G5344"\w*: \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w Felix|strong="G5344"\w*, \w willing|strong="G2309"\w* to \w shew|strong="G2698"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* a \w pleasure|strong="G5485"\w*, \w left|strong="G1210"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w bound|strong="G2641"\w*.
